name: Orchard: Regrown
description:
Orchard: Regrown is a relaxing garden simulator based on one of my first games, Orchard!

O:R was made as a study of Simulation mechanics, as well as Artificially Intelligent Agents.

Delight in growing all varieties of plants that have unique needs in order to grow. Machines can be built to automate simple tasks like watering and mulching soil, and drones can dynamically react to plant's needs.

Bees can be used with pollination sticks to cross-breed flowers with their own special needs and appearances.

Original Soundtrack by Sonny Rehman.

The Dev build of the game can be found here.
